headline: Why Analysts Say Akamai Technologies (AKAM) Story Is Shifting Toward Security Compute And AI
summary: The recent shift in Akamai Technologies' fair value estimate to US$101.16 from US$95.20 reflects updated assumptions around how its push into security, compute, and AI infrastructure might influence the long term outlook. With the discount rate trimmed to 10.21% and revenue growth now modeled at 6.99%, the revised target remains in the same ballpark as recent Street work that clusters around the US$100 to US$115 range, but still embeds a mix of optimism and caution about the investment needed...

headline: Akamai Technologies: Growing Edge Opportunities In The Agentic AI Era
summary: Akamai's transformation into cloud security and edge AI inference is driving growth, offsetting legacy CDN declines. Learn more about AKAM stock here.
